name: Parmesan Asparagus
author: Roberta Spaller Zerkovich
summary: So quick and easy, this cheesy asparagus dish goes great with pork or poultry. Even those in my family that turn up their noses to asparagus, love this dish!
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)
Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray
Lightly coat asparagus with cooking spray; place on prepared baking sheet
Combine Parmesan cheese and garlic salt in a small bowl; set aside
Bake in preheated oven for 6 minutes; turn asparagus and continue baking until tender, about 6 minutes
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese mixture over asparagus
